content:
Reduce Agent Handling Time with Conversation Intelligence

Automatically trigger actions based on intelligence signals from your telephony system or keywords mentioned by agents or customers. Create a rule that sends notifications, displays recommendations to agents, or runs processes in the background.

Available in: Lightning Experience
Available with Service Cloud Voice and Partner Telephony models.

Create a Conversation Intelligence rule to trigger an action when an agent or customer speaks or types a keyword on the phone or in a message. Sample actions include sending notifications, displaying recommendations, and running processes in the background.

Automate actions based on intelligence signals detected by your telephony system. If your telephony system detects that the customer is unhappy during a support call, Service Cloud Voice can show a Next Best Action recommendation.

Set up an Einstein Next Best Action component to show recommendations to agents based on keywords or intelligence signals.
Use autolaunched flows to run business processes without an event trigger.

Automatically Trigger an Action Based on Detected Keywords
Taking Action Based on Intelligence Signals
Set Up a Next Best Action
Set Up an Autolaunched Flow
title: Reduce Agent Handling Time with Conversation Intelligence
